andfn.dfn.Well¶

class andfn.dfn.Well(label, radius, center, head, frac0, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(label, radius, center, head, frac0, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initializes the well class. :param label: The label of the well. :type label: str or int :param radius: The radius of the well. :type radius: float :param center: The complex location of the well. :type center: complex :param head: The hydraulic head of the well. :type head: float :param frac: The label of the fracture the well is associated with. :type frac: Fracture :param q: The flow rate of the well. :type q: float

Methods

__init__(label, radius, center, head, frac0, ...)

Initializes the well class.

calc_omega(z)

Calculates the omega for the well.

calc_w(z)

Calculates the omega for the well.

change_property(**kwargs)

Change a given property/ies of the element.

check_boundary_condition([n])

Checks the boundary condition of the well.

check_chi_crossing(z0, z1[, atol])

Checks if the line between two points, z0 and z1, crosses the well.

consolidate()

Consolidate into a numpy structures array.

consolidate_hpc()

Consolidate into a numpy structures array for HPC solver.

discharge_term(z)

Returns the discharge term for the well.

set_id(id_)

Set the id of the element.

set_new_ncoef(n[, nint_mult])

Increase the number of coefficients in the asymptotic expansion.

unconsolidate(struc_array, index_array, fracs)

Unconsolidate from a numpy structures array.

unconsolidate_hpc(struc_array, index_array, ...)

Unconsolidate from a numpy structures array for HPC solver.

z_array(n)

Returns an array of n points on the well.
